mapper.sql: id, name, server_id, srv_ctgy_id, price, description, status

si.id AS id, si.name AS name, si.srv_ctgy_id AS srvctgyid, cgy.name AS cgyname, si.price AS price, si.description AS description, si.status AS status FROM t_service_item AS si LEFT JOIN t_srv_category AS cgy ON si.srv_ctgy_id = cgy.id
mapper.select: SELECT FROM t_service_item WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT WHERE si.server_id = #{serverid} AND si.status = b'1' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT WHERE si.server_id = #{serverid} AND si.status = b'0' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT WHERE si.srv_ctgy_id = #{cgyId} AND si.status = b'0' ORDER BY name ASC
